articles.description: Diljit Dosanjh, who scripted history at BC Place stadium, in Vancouver, took to his social media handle to express his gratitude.
articles.content: Earlier this month, when Diljit Dosanjh performed in Mumbai to a packed stadium, he promised that his upcoming Vancouver Tour, Dil-Luminati, would be a memorable one. True to his word, the performanc… [+3085 chars]
